subject: Re: [junit] NullPointerException in XMLJUnitResultFormatter.endTest
msgSnippet: ... Did you modify your excluded.properties file?  Try to avoid reloading your xml classes by defining another excluded package (e.g. org.xml.*) in the list of
messageBody:
> I recently added the tag that creates reports in XML and text format
> for generating junitreports. Unfortunately, our tests hang when we
> do that with the following error.

Did you modify your excluded.properties file? Try to avoid reloading your xml classes by defining another excluded package (e.g. org.xml.*) in the list of excluded ones.

Another question: will your code be open sourced?

-Vladimir
